title: Paul Caddick
text:
Paul Caddick (born July 1950) is a British businessman who is the founder of <a href="Caddick%20Group">Caddick Group</a>, a civil engineering business established in 1979, and <a href="Moda%20Living">Moda Living</a>, a property development company. He is currently the director of 119 companies.
Early life.
Paul Caddick is the son of a miner.
Career.
Cadddick worked for <a href="West%20Yorkshire%20County%20Council">West Yorkshire County Council</a>, <a href="John%20Laing%20Group">John Laing</a> and the civil engineers <a href="Sir%20Lindsay%20Parkinson">Sir Lindsay Parkinson</a>, before starting his own business in 1980.
In 1997, he and <a href="Gary%20Hetherington">Gary Hetherington</a> purchased <a href="Leeds%20Rhinos">Leeds Rhinos</a> rugby team, and they co-founded <a href="Leeds%20Rugby%20Limited">Leeds Rugby Limited</a>. He is also the owner of the Headingley cricket and rugby ground.
